english.segment1: forget the politics and all the hypocrites. you know the body's sick from religion, indecision, mediocrity
english.segment2: you think you're too young. you say you're too dumb. wait 'til tomorrow comes. but today is the day you've got to show the way
english.segment3: (chorus). I say hey, now, now - we're callin' you out. never back down - no fear, no doubt. hey now, now - you can show us how. you better get up 'cause we're callin' all church punks
english.segment4: this is a call for a truth rebellion. to all the people who hear, this is a call. to make a stand, throw your fists up in the air. (yeah) make up your mind - now is the time
